programme.title: Obsession
programme.desc: A farmhand begins an affair with his elderly boss' young wife.

programme.title: Dope
programme.desc: High school senior Malcolm and his friends face a wild adventure after a nightclub party turns violent.

programme.title: A Day in the Life
programme.desc: Bad blood between two crime families explodes into an all-out turf war.

programme.title: Caught In The Crossfire
programme.desc: Two detectives investigating a shooting find themselves targeted by both gang members and crooked cops.

programme.title: Armed Response
programme.desc: An armed team of six investigates what's wrong in a remote prison.

programme.title: The Ride
programme.desc: The inspiring story of a BMX champion who overcame an abusive childhood. Starring Ludacris.

programme.title: Miss Sharon Jones!
programme.desc: Follow the talented and gregarious soul singer as she struggles to find her health and voice again.

programme.title: Bojangles
programme.desc: Follow Bill "Mr. Bojangles" Robinson (Gregory Hines) rising from vaudeville to a legendary entertainer.

programme.title: Phantom Punch
programme.desc: The controversial life story of heavyweight boxing champion, Sonny Liston. Starring Ving Rhames.

programme.title: Cooley High
programme.desc: Chicago, 1964: Two teens navigate the end of high school in this authentic portrait of Black youth.

programme.title: Holiday Heart
programme.desc: Ving Rhames plays a drag queen who cares for a drug addict (Alfre Woodard) and helps raise her daughter.

programme.title: Inevitable Defeat of Mister & Pete
programme.desc: Two inner city boys are left to fend for themselves over the summer after their mothers are taken away.

programme.title: Monster's Ball
programme.desc: A racist prison guard reexamines his beliefs while falling in love with an African American woman.

programme.title: Street Smart
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman stars as a pimp who gets mistaken for a fictional pimp in a journalist's story.
